item.title: Image Gallery Builder - Simple Scene Building tool for OpenGL
item.description:
Abstract

This educational project focuses on the topic of rendering optimization through batching draw calls in a Custom OpenGL Rasterization Engine using Blinn-Phong Shading model. I developed an image gallery scene building tool that parses the scene data files and renders the environment, allow the camera to move freely around the scene. The engine supports material-based batching allowing up to 32 materials to be grouped per draw call. Any mesh that uses the same material will be effectively batched together to reduce overhead and improve performance.
